register.title: Create Account
register.username_help: Username must start with a letter or number and be 3-50 characters long (letters, numbers, underscores, hyphens)
register.password_help: Password must be at least 8 characters long
register.success_message: Your account has been created successfully. You can now log in with your credentials.
register.disabled_message: New user registration is currently disabled. Please contact an administrator to create an account.
register.missing_fields: Please fill in all required fields
register.password_too_short: Password must be at least 8 characters long
register.user_exists: A user with this username or email already exists
register.already_have_account: Already have an account? Sign in

home.pair_with_cloud: Pair with cloud to load folders
home.settings_config: Go to Settings for additional configuration.

filedrop.instruction: Click to upload or drag and drop
filedrop.invalid_type: Please select a PDF, EPUB, JPEG, or a PNG file.

user_delete.title: Delete Account
user_delete.current_user_warning: Are you sure you want to permanently delete your account?
user_delete.admin_user_warning: Are you sure you want to permanently delete user {{username}}?

current_user.data_deletion: Delete all your data including uploaded documents and API keys
current_user.remove_sessions: Remove all your sessions and log you out
current_user.permanent_removal: Permanently remove your account from the system

admin_user.data_deletion: Delete all user data including archived documents and API keys

user_delete.note_current: Your reMarkable Cloud account and device data will remain completely unaffected.
user_delete.note_admin: The user's reMarkable Cloud account and device data will remain completely unaffected.
user_delete.cannot_undo_current: This action cannot be undone and you will lose access to all your data.

admin.title: Admin Panel
admin.description: Manage users, system settings, and monitor system health

descriptions.registration_help: Allow self-service creation of new user accounts
descriptions.backup_description: Creates a complete backup including database and user files as a .tar.gz archive
descriptions.restore_description: Restores database and user files from backup archive (.tar.gz format)
descriptions.upload_restore_description: Upload a backup file to restore later with confirmation
descriptions.restore_warning: Warning: Restoring will completely overwrite all current data
descriptions.max_api_keys_help: Set the maximum number of API keys each user can create (1-100)

dialogs.confirm_restore_description: You are about to restore from backup file:
dialogs.restore_warning_text: This will permanently overwrite all current data including:
dialogs.restore_final_warning: This action cannot be undone. Make sure you have a current backup before proceeding.
dialogs.version_warning: Warning: This backup was created with a newer version of Stationmaster. Restoring may fail or cause unexpected behavior.

errors.password_length: Password must be at least 8 characters long
errors.backup_file_type: Invalid file type. Please select a backup archive (.tar.gz or .tgz). Selected file:
errors.max_api_keys_invalid: Please enter a value between 1 and 100

backup.background_description: Creates a backup in the background that you can download once complete

restore.job_created: Restore job created successfully. The restore will begin processing shortly.
restore.background_description: Uploads and restores a backup in the background with progress tracking

messages.backup_job_created: Backup job created successfully. You will be able to download it once complete.

settings.title: User Settings
settings.description: Manage your profile, API keys, and account preferences

messages.pair_help: Pair with reMarkable cloud to select from existing folders
messages.delete_warning_intro: Clicking below will open a confirmation dialog. Once confirmed, your account will be permanently deleted along with all associated data. This includes:
messages.remarkable_unaffected: Your reMarkable Cloud account and device data will remain completely unaffected.
messages.api_key_created_message: Copy this key now - it won't be shown again:
messages.api_key_limit_reached: You've reached your limit of {{maxKeys}} API keys

help.cover_page: Controls whether the first page or current page is used as the cover for uploaded documents
help.conflict_resolution: Choose what happens when uploading a document with the same name as an existing document. Content Only preserves annotations and only works for PDFs and images - it will Abort for EPUBs. Overwrite completely replaces documents.
help.folder_depth_limit: Maximum folder depth to display (leave empty for unlimited)
help.folder_exclusion_list: Comma-separated list of folder names to exclude, case-sensitive
help.pdf_conversion_device: Choose your reMarkable device model for optimal image to PDF conversion. This setting only affects image files (JPEG, PNG) that are converted to PDF.
help.default_directory: Choose the default folder on your reMarkable where your documents will be uploaded

delete_warnings.api_keys: All API keys and their access

dialogs.delete_api_key_message: Are you sure you want to delete the API key

delete_api_key_consequences.stop_apps: Stop all applications using this key from working
delete_api_key_consequences.remove: Remove the key from your account

dialogs.delete_account_confirmation: Are you sure you want to permanently delete your account? This action cannot be undone.
dialogs.unpair_confirmation_message: Are you sure you want to unpair from reMarkable cloud? You'll need to pair again to upload documents.

password_reset.title: Reset Password
password_reset.email_sent: If an account exists, a password reset link has been sent to your email
password_reset.success: Password has been reset successfully. You can now log in with your new password.
password_reset.email_instruction: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password.

auth.no_token: No auth token or API key
auth.username_too_short: Username must be at least 3 characters long
auth.username_too_long: Username must be no more than 50 characters long
auth.username_invalid_format: Username must start with a letter or number and contain only letters, numbers, underscores, and hyphens

status.no_url: No URL found in request body
status.upload_success: Your document is available on your reMarkable at {{path}}
status.upload_success_multiple:
Your documents are available on your reMarkable at:
{{paths}}
status.conflict_entry_exists: A document with this name already exists on your reMarkable. Change your {{conflict_resolution}} setting in {{settings}}, or rename the document.

errors.create_file: Could not create file on disk
errors.memory_constrained: Server memory insufficient for file processing
errors.upload_stream_failed: Failed to process large file upload
